entry.title: Superior Glove Sure knit SLSXB9MC - Sure Knit Sleeve 9 Inch Knit High Performance Fibers With Metal Clip ANSI A8 Cut
entry.summary:
Vendor: Superior Glove
Type:
Price: 27.14

[shortdesc]
  • Sure Knit Sleeve 9 Inch Knit High Performance Fibers With Metal Clip ANSI A8 Cut
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand Superior Glove
    Line Sure knit
    ANSI Cut Rating Cut 8
    Application carving), Fish Processing, Meat processing (boning
    Origin Country CA
    Size Large

    Product Information

  • These gloves are treated with Ultra-Fresh to achieve 99.9% antimicrobial status
  • Fully launderable
  • sleeves retain shape, size and antimicrobial properties wash after wash
  • Attachment clip at bicep for stay-in-place comfort and protection
  • Blue color allows for easy spotting if pieces accidentally come away during food processing
  • USA Food and Drug Administration (FDA) compliant.
  • Sleeves are fully washable up to 85°C
  • To limit the risk of allergic reactions, all of our Canadian-made gloves are now crafted with latex-free materials
  • FDA and CFIA compliant
  • Available without thumbhole in the following length: 18" (#SLSXB18MC)
  • Available with thumbhole in the following length: 18" (#SLSXB18TMC)
  • Available with STAYz-UP armbands in the following length: 24" (#SLSXB24)

entry.title: Superior Glove SLPB9TH-One Size - Superior Woven Punkban Sleeve 9 Inch With Thumbhole ANSI A4 Cut/ Puncture 4
entry.summary:
Vendor: Superior Glove
Type:
Price: 60.83

[shortdesc]

Puncture and Cut-Resistant Sleeve made with Punkban

  • Superior Woven Punkban Sleeve 9 Inch With Thumbhole ANSI A4 Cut/ Puncture 4
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand Superior Glove
    ANSI Cut Rating Cut 4
    ANSI Puncture Rating Puncture 4
    Application Automotive, Glass Handling, Metal Fabrication, Metal Handling,
    Origin Country CN
    Puncture Resistant Yes
    Size One Size

    Product Information

  • Our unique Punkban material is highly durable for superb forearm protection
  • Protects against cut, abrasion and puncture hazards
  • Adjustable Velcro closure
  • Designed and tested for protection from hypodermic needles
  • Punkban offers puncture protection in a woven material by spinning and weaving Kevlar
  • "I have used them every time I've worked in my shop
  • I have very fragile skin on my forearms - even the slightest brush against the edge of a door or shelf causes a dark bruise
  • I have tried Posey arm sleeves (a knitted product) and another product advertised for use when working with plants that have thorns
  • After using these I was still looking for a better solution
  • The Superior Glove puncture resistant sleeves work great at protecting the fragile skin on my forearms and they are a lot more convenient to use than the other products I have tried
  • I have used them frequently since they arrived and I am very pleased with their performance." - Marty Bolte, (Bolte Art & Sculpture).

    • Suggested Application

  • Other Sleeves
    		•
